title: how far back can you research wilmington newspapers?
text:
The news archive on our website (down at the bottom left of the home
page)has articles back to 2002 online. In addition, this links to a
Google newspaper archive that includes some StarNews archives back
into the 1970s, but the Google collection is not complete, so searches
can be hit-or-miss sometimes. The New Hanover County Public Library
local history room has archive copies of the newspaper on microfilm
and some paper copies that date back into the late 1800s. The local
history staff also has clip files on many topics and the staff there
can assist you in research.
